content.content: 1. Each of the following instruments shall be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form for the instrument appears on the Government of Ontario website: 1. An instrument registered under subsection 22 (7) of the Act, other than an instrument described in paragraph 2. 2. A notice of a lease of chattels that have become, or may become, fixtures.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. Each of the following instruments shall be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form for the instrument appears on the Government of Ontario website:

1. An instrument registered under subsection 22 (7) of the Act, other than an instrument described in paragraph 2.

2. A notice of a lease of chattels that have become, or may become, fixtures.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 1.

content.content: 2. A notice registered under subsection 22 (8) of the Act, a renewal notice registered under subsection 22 (10) of the Act and a statement of good faith mentioned in subsection 22 (11) of the Act shall each be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. A notice registered under subsection 22 (8) of the Act, a renewal notice registered under subsection 22 (10) of the Act and a statement of good faith mentioned in subsection 22 (11) of the Act shall each be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 2.

content.section: Statement under s. 25 of the Act
content.content: 3. A statement under subsection 25 (4) of the Act shall be in the form dated September 1, 2011, as it appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. A statement under subsection 25 (4) of the Act shall be in the form dated September 1, 2011, as it appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 3.

content.content: 4. A certificate of a judge under subsection 35 (2), 46 (1.1) or 47 (3) of the Act shall each be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. A certificate of a judge under subsection 35 (2), 46 (1.1) or 47 (3) of the Act shall each be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 4.

content.content: 5. A certificate of discharge under subsection 56 (1), section 62, subsection 65 (2) or section 66 of the Act shall be in the form required for a discharge under subsection 2 (3) of Regulation 688 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Form of Documents) made under the Land Registration Reform Act.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. A certificate of discharge under subsection 56 (1), section 62, subsection 65 (2) or section 66 of the Act shall be in the form required for a discharge under subsection 2 (3) of Regulation 688 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Form of Documents) made under the Land Registration Reform Act.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 5.

content.content: 6. (0.1) The approval of the examiner of surveys described in subsection 6 (3) or (8) or section 12 of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (1). (1) A certificate of a surveyor required by subsection 9 (2) or clause 16 (1) (i) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act or clause 19 (5) (a) of that Regulation with respect to parts that are surveyed shall be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (1). (1.1) A certificate of registration required by section 13, clause 16 (1) (j) or 27 (2) (b) or subsection  36 (2) or 43 (1) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (1). (2) A certificate of a surveyor required by clause 16 (1) (h) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (2). (3)-(5) Revoked: O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (2). (6) A receipt for a plan prepared for deposit as required by subclause 16 (1) (k) (i) or clause 20 (1) (c) or 21 (5) (a) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (6). (7) A requisition for a deposit of a plan prepared for deposit as required by subclause 16 (1) (k) (ii) or clause 20 (1) (d) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (7). (7.1) A certificate of a surveyor required by subsection 19 (4) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act or clause 19 (5) (a) of that Regulation with respect to parts that are compiled shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (3). (8) A schedule required by clause 20 (1) (e), subsection 20 (3), 35 (1) or 41 (1) or clause 80 (a) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (4). (9) A certificate of an owner required by clause 24 (a) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (9); O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (5). (10) A note required by clause 24 (b) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (10). (11) A note required by clause 24 (c) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (6). (11.1) A statement to accompany a Plan Document required by clause 25 (1) (a) or subsection 82 (3) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (6). (12) A consent described in clause 25 (1) (b) or subsection 82 (3) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (12); O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (7). (13) A certificate of the clerk and the head of the council of the municipality required by subsection 42 (5) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (13). (14) An application to correct a registered or deposited plan mentioned in subsection 49 (3) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (14). (15) A certificate of correction of a plan required by subsection 49 (10) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (15). (16) A certificate of a surveyor required by paragraph 1 of section 72, subsection 74 (1) or (2), clause 76 (c) or section 79 of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act with respect to parts that are surveyed shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (8). (17) A note required by clause 76 (b) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (8). (18) A certificate of a surveyor required by section 78 or 79 of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act with respect to parts that are compiled shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (8). (19) A certificate of an owner required by subsection 82 (1) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (8).

6. (0.1) The approval of the examiner of surveys described in subsection 6 (3) or (8) or section 12 of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (1).

(1) A certificate of a surveyor required by subsection 9 (2) or clause 16 (1) (i) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act or clause 19 (5) (a) of that Regulation with respect to parts that are surveyed shall be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (1).

(1.1) A certificate of registration required by section 13, clause 16 (1) (j) or 27 (2) (b) or subsection  36 (2) or 43 (1) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (1).

(2) A certificate of a surveyor required by clause 16 (1) (h) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (2).

(3)-(5) Revoked: O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (2).

(6) A receipt for a plan prepared for deposit as required by subclause 16 (1) (k) (i) or clause 20 (1) (c) or 21 (5) (a) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (6).

(7) A requisition for a deposit of a plan prepared for deposit as required by subclause 16 (1) (k) (ii) or clause 20 (1) (d) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (7).

(7.1) A certificate of a surveyor required by subsection 19 (4) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act or clause 19 (5) (a) of that Regulation with respect to parts that are compiled shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (3).

(8) A schedule required by clause 20 (1) (e), subsection 20 (3), 35 (1) or 41 (1) or clause 80 (a) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (4).

(9) A certificate of an owner required by clause 24 (a) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (9); O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (5).

(10) A note required by clause 24 (b) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (10).

(11) A note required by clause 24 (c) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (6).

(11.1) A statement to accompany a Plan Document required by clause 25 (1) (a) or subsection 82 (3) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (6).

(12) A consent described in clause 25 (1) (b) or subsection 82 (3) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (12); O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (7).

(13) A certificate of the clerk and the head of the council of the municipality required by subsection 42 (5) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (13).

(14) An application to correct a registered or deposited plan mentioned in subsection 49 (3) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (14).

(15) A certificate of correction of a plan required by subsection 49 (10) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form specified by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 6 (15).

(16) A certificate of a surveyor required by paragraph 1 of section 72, subsection 74 (1) or (2), clause 76 (c) or section 79 of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act with respect to parts that are surveyed shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (8).

(17) A note required by clause 76 (b) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (8).

(18) A certificate of a surveyor required by section 78 or 79 of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act with respect to parts that are compiled shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (8).

(19) A certificate of an owner required by subsection 82 (1) of Ontario Regulation 43/96 (Surveys, Plans and Descriptions of Land) made under the Act shall be in the form for it dated January 1, 2018, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 90/18, s. 1 (8).

content.section: Instruments not conforming to proper plan
content.content: 7. The statement mentioned in subsection 86 (1) of the Act that is required to register an instrument mentioned in that subsection shall be a statement in the form dated September 1, 2011, as it appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 7.
content.raw_html: 7. The statement mentioned in subsection 86 (1) of the Act that is required to register an instrument mentioned in that subsection shall be a statement in the form dated September 1, 2011, as it appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 7.

content.content: 8. (1) A requisition under section 107 of the Act shall be in the form required by subsection 2 (4) of Regulation 688 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Form of Documents) made under the Land Registration Reform Act.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 8 (1). (2) A certificate of deposit mentioned in subsection 108 (2) of the Act shall be in the form approved by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 8 (2).
content.raw_html:
8. (1) A requisition under section 107 of the Act shall be in the form required by subsection 2 (4) of Regulation 688 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Form of Documents) made under the Land Registration Reform Act.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 8 (1).

(2) A certificate of deposit mentioned in subsection 108 (2) of the Act shall be in the form approved by the Director of Titles.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 8 (2).

content.section: Notice of claim under s. 113 of the Act
content.content: 9. A notice of claim registered under subsection 113 (2) of the Act and a statement in support of such a claim shall each be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 9.
content.raw_html: 9. A notice of claim registered under subsection 113 (2) of the Act and a statement in support of such a claim shall each be in the form for it dated September 1, 2011, as the form appears on the Government of Ontario website.  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 9.

content.section: Notice of claim under s. 113 of the Act
content.content: 10. Omitted (provides for amendments to this Regulation).  O. Reg. 434/11, s. 10.
